alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 9:25PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Natrona County through 1000 PM MDT... At 925 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Evansville to 6 miles south of Emigrant Gap. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mills around 930 PM MDT. Evansville around 935 PM MDT. Downtown Casper around 940 PM MDT. Bar Nunn around 945 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Red Butte and Paradise Valley. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 178 and 200. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
